An_approachable_performant_and_versatile: An approachable, performant and versatile boilerplate for building SSR applications.
Add_components_without_sending_additiona: Add components without sending additional client-side JavaScript. Built on the latest React features.
Automatic_Image_Font_and_Script_Optimiza: Automatic Image, Font, and Script Optimizations for improved UX and Core Web Vitals.
A_rich_incredibly_adoptable_template_tha: A rich, incredibly adoptable template that scales between a small showcase website and a full-size app.
This_is_a_simple_about_page_just_to_show: This is a simple about page just to show how you can use the internationalization in different pages
Hey_what_do_you_want_to_learn_today?: Hey, what do you want to learn today?
Select_one_of_the_topics_from_below_and_: Select one of the topics from below and start playing.
We_would_love_to_hear_your_thoughts_Plea: We would love to hear your thoughts! Please share your feedback below.

Chop_can_make_mistakes_Check_important_i: Chop can make mistakes. Check important info.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.description: We are a small startup dedicated to building the first social learning platform: Chop.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to fix the education system by building tools that allow people to become self-taught.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to create a world where learning is accessible to everyone, anywhere.

PricingPage.title: Pricing
PricingPage.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for you.
PricingPage.chopIsFree: Chop is free forever. After each study session, you'll see ads. To remove ads, you can subscribe.

individual.title: Individual
individual.description: Ideal for solo users. Are you a student?

family.title: Family
family.description: Best for families of up to six members.

enterprise.title: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Tailored solutions for large businesses and organizations.

post1.title: Unlocking the Secrets of Successful Startups
post1.excerpt: Discover the key strategies and insights that have propelled the most innovative startups to success. From funding to scaling, this blog post covers it all.

post2.title: How to Scale Your Business Efficiently
post2.excerpt: Learn the best practices for scaling your business without compromising on quality or service.
